[Acute Vision](/Feats.aspx?ID=130) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=18" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 88 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

---

When you are raging, your visual senses improve, granting you darkvision.

<title level="2">Acute Vision leads to...</title>
[Acute Scent](/Feats.aspx?ID=135)
name: Acute Vision
